item.name: Philosophy
item.description: Find out why gump was built and what our goals are with the gump project.

item.name: How Gump Works
item.description: Get the 10-mile-high overview of the gump architecture and workflow.

item.name: How-To's
item.description: Get concrete guides to working with and on gump.

item.name: Metadata
item.description: Look up the details of the gump descriptor syntax.

content.p: Gump is not a trivial project. We compile thousands of sourcefiles every night, and try to send the right reports to hundreds of projects when something bad happens. This means that there's a lot to "get" about gump. Besides the information on this part of our website, make sure to take a look at:

ul.li: the Main gump website -- you're looking at our new documentation (ie, a work in progress). The main website contains a wealth of other information.
the Gump wiki -- Gump has an active wiki with a lot of tidbits of information.
